text: china is the world's second largest
economy and it's still growing faster
than most major countries around the
world but the economy is slowing down
and China's citizens are getting nervous
they're sending money overseas at an
unprecedented rate in 2015 almost a
trillion dollars was sent outside China
legally each person can take fifty
thousand dollars out of the country each
year but there are a number of ways
people are getting around that limit
most methods involves sending cash
through Hong Kong carrying it across the
border that's risky smurfing large
groups of people shifting money of half
as one person and aleeza electronic
money transfers the money has to go
somewhere and a lot of it is ending up
in big cities like London New York and
Melbourne where it's driving up property
prices
